name: Duc Bui
title: Entrepreneur and Software Business Owner
about: You want some dark-magic but legitimate softwares that solve untraditional problems ? We can help you.I own a software building team that look around for niche ideas and build them into products. We hope to solve tiny but painful problems for my customers.
